channel.title: Belen|Valencia County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Belen|Valencia County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End BL-25 North at I-25
item.description: End BL-25 north at I-25. Use I-25 north for Albuquerque; use I-25 south for Socorro. This is the northern end of the Belen business loop.

item.title: NM-314 North/BL-25 North Approaching Split
item.description: NM-314 North/BL-25 North approaching split. Use right lanes for NM-314 north towards Las Lunas. Use left lanes for BL-25 North towards I-25.
